title: EastEnders spoilers: Shock twist as Daniel revealed to be alive as Jean attends his memorial
text:
After receiving tragic news last night in EastEnders, Jean Slater (Gillian Wright) mourned her fallen friend in tonight’s episode, as — with Kush Kazemi (Davood Ghadami) by her side — she attended his memorial service. However, there was shock twist in store for viewers, as Daniel (Adrian Edmondson) was later revealed to be alive.

With Martin (James Bye) back in Walford, Jean was optimistic about the prospect of Stacey (Lacey Turner) returning home so that she could inform her about how close she’d grown to new pal Daniel. However, her world came crashing down when she discovered that Daniel had passed away.

Kush comforted Jean, and reminded her of how important it is for her to be able to say goodbye, and in tonight’s episode, the pair attended Daniel’s memorial service — a service which was about as quintessentially Daniel as one could’ve hoped for.

An emotional Jean mourned her pal, before exiting service and thanking Kush for coming along with her. However, atop the Prince Albert, Mike — aka Daniel’s neighbour who hosted the service — met with Daniel, who — spoiler alert — is very much alive!

Advertisement

Advertisement

As the pair discussed Daniel’s motivations behind his fake death, it came to light that he — who admittedly is falling for Jean — was fearful of Jean falling for him, as he doesn’t want her to have to see him through the final stages of his illness.

As the episode neared its conclusion, a tearful Jean sat on the park bench, and burst into tears.

Will Jean discover that Daniel is alive after all?

EastEnders continues Monday 14thOctober at 8pm on BBC One.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: Jean mourned Daniel — while he watched her from afar.
